languages.text: {n}Джай увлеченно сравнивает записи в золоченной инфопластине и свежие отчеты с {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g}. Завидев вас, женщина с улыбкой откладывает и то, и другое.{/n} "Ах, шерин! Нелегок труд имперского представителя, а когда он еще и {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладной торговлей{/g} промышляет по совместительству... Ух! Пикантные ощущения. Словно все сразу сделались тебе и союзниками, и врагами. Ну а как вы поживаете, свет очей моих?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай увлеченно сравнивает записи в золоченной инфопластине и свежие отчеты с {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g}. Завидев вас, женщина с улыбкой откладывает и то, и другое.{/n} "Ах, шерин! Нелегок труд имперского представителя, а когда он еще и {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладной торговлей{/g} промышляет по совместительству... Ух! Пикантные ощущения. Словно все сразу сделались тебе и союзниками, и врагами. Ну а как вы поживаете, свет очей моих?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, oh precious apple of my eye?"

Словно все сразу сделались тебе и союзниками, и врагами. Ну а как вы поживаете, свет очей моих?"

The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, o precious apple of my eye?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊正热切地比较着镀金数据板上的记录，以及从{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}传来的新报告。当她注意到你时，她微笑着，把手上的东西全都放在一旁。{/n}“啊，亲爱的！帝国贸易代表身上的担子很重，尤其这位代表还要兼职从事{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}……啊哈！这实在是太令人振奋了，仿佛每个人都在突然之间既变成了你的盟友，又变成了你的敌人。噢，你还好吗，我眼中的明珠？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, oh precious apple of my eye?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊正热切地比较着镀金数据板上的记录，以及从{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}传来的新报告。当她注意到你时，她微笑着，把手上的东西全都放在一旁。{/n}“啊，亲爱的！帝国贸易代表身上的担子很重，尤其这位代表还要兼职从事{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}……啊哈！这实在是太令人振奋了，仿佛每个人都在突然之间既变成了你的盟友，又变成了你的敌人。噢，你还好吗，我眼中的明珠？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from Footfall. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the Cold Trade on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, o precious apple of my eye?"

languages.text: {n}Jae compara con entusiasmo los registros de una tablilla de datos chapada en oro con los nuevos informes que llegan de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Cuando te ve, sonríe y lo deja todo a un lado.{/n} «¡Ah, shereen! La carga de una representante comercial del Imperium es pesada, especialmente cuando dicha representante se dedica al {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g} en su tiempo libre... ¡Uf! Es emocionante, como si todos los involucrados se convirtieran en aliados y enemigos al mismo tiempo. ¿A usted qué tal le va, luz de mis ojos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, oh precious apple of my eye?"

Cuando te ve, sonríe y lo deja todo a un lado.{/n} «¡Ah, shereen! La carga de una representante comercial del Imperium es pesada, especialmente cuando dicha representante se dedica al {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g} en su tiempo libre... ¡Uf! Es emocionante, como si todos los involucrados se convirtieran en aliados y enemigos al mismo tiempo. ¿A usted qué tal le va, luz de mis ojos?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}から送られてくる新しい報告書と、金色のデータスレートの記録を熱心に見比べている。あなたに気づくと彼女は微笑み、それらを脇に置いた。{/n}「ああ、シャリーン！帝国の交易代表の重責は大変なものなのよ。特に、その代表が副業として{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}闇取引{/g}に手を出している場合はね…ふう！なんとも爽快な気分よ！まるで皆が突然、同時に敵と味方になったかのような感じね。それで、調子はどうなの、愛しいあなた！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, o precious apple of my eye?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}から送られてくる新しい報告書と、金色のデータスレートの記録を熱心に見比べている。あなたに気づくと彼女は微笑み、それらを脇に置いた。{/n}「ああ、シャリーン！帝国の交易代表の重責は大変なものなのよ。特に、その代表が副業として{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}闇取引{/g}に手を出している場合はね…ふう！なんとも爽快な気分よ！まるで皆が突然、同時に敵と味方になったかのような感じね。それで、調子はどうなの、愛しいあなた！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae ist voller Begeisterung dabei, Daten auf einem vergoldeten Datablock mit frischen Berichten aus {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} abzugleichen. Als sie dich bemerkt, lächelt Jae und legt ihre Arbeit beiseite.{/n} "Ah, Shereen! Handelsvertreter des Imperiums tragen eine schwere Last — besonders, wenn sie nebenher noch ein wenig {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} betreiben ... Puh! Es ist berauschend, als wären alle plötzlich Verbündete und Feinde gleichzeitig geworden. Also, wie geht es Euch, oh, kostbares Licht meiner Augen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, oh precious apple of my eye?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ist voller Begeisterung dabei, Daten auf einem vergoldeten Datablock mit frischen Berichten aus {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} abzugleichen. Als sie dich bemerkt, lächelt Jae und legt ihre Arbeit beiseite.{/n} "Ah, Shereen! Handelsvertreter des Imperiums tragen eine schwere Last — besonders, wenn sie nebenher noch ein wenig {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} betreiben ... Puh! Es ist berauschend, als wären alle plötzlich Verbündete und Feinde gleichzeitig geworden. Also, wie geht es Euch, oh, kostbares Licht meiner Augen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae travaille avec enthousiasme, comparant les informations d'une plaque de données dorée à des rapports récents envoyés par {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Elle les met de côté lorsqu'elle remarque votre présence et vous sourit.{/n} « Ah, shereen ! C'est un fardeau bien lourd que porte une représentante commerciale de l'Imperium, surtout quand ladite représentante barbote dans le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} à ses heures perdues... Pfiou ! Mais c'est aussi grisant, comme si tout le monde était devenu des alliés et des ennemis en même temps. Alors, comment allez-vous, prunelle de mes yeux ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! The burden of a trade representative of the Imperium is a hefty one, especially when said representative is dabbling in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on the side... Whew! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, oh precious apple of my eye?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae travaille avec enthousiasme, comparant les informations d'une plaque de données dorée à des rapports récents envoyés par {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Elle les met de côté lorsqu'elle remarque votre présence et vous sourit.{/n} « Ah, shereen ! C'est un fardeau bien lourd que porte une représentante commerciale de l'Imperium, surtout quand ladite représentante barbote dans le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} à ses heures perdues... Pfiou ! Mais c'est aussi grisant, comme si tout le monde était devenu des alliés et des ennemis en même temps. Alors, comment allez-vous, prunelle de mes yeux ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, elindeki kayıtları gösterişli bir databelada {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'dan{/g} gelen yeni raporlarla karşılaştırıyor. Seni fark ettiğinde gülümseyerek onları bir kenara bırakıyor.{/n} "Şirinim! İmparatorluk'un ticaret temsilcisi olmanın yükü gerçekten ağır, özellikle de söz konusu temsilci bir taraftan da {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Ticaret'le{/g} uğraşıyorsa. Üf! Diken üstünde olmaya mecburum. Herkes bir anda hem müttefikim hem de düşmanım olmuş gibi. Gözümün bebeği, sen nasılsın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is enthusiastically comparing records on a gilded data-slate with fresh reports coming in from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. When she notices you, Jae smiles and puts them aside.{/n} "Ah, shereen! It is exhilarating, as if everyone suddenly became allies and enemies at the same time. So how are you doing, oh precious apple of my eye?"
